Package metricas

Class LOC_class

java.lang.Object
com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry
metricas.Metric
metricas.LOC_class
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.codahale.metrics.Metric, com.codahale.metrics.MetricSet
public class LOC_class extends Metric
LOC_class is a type of Metric that counts the number of lines of a class
Since:
1.0
See Also:
Metric, MetricHandler

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    applyMetricFilter​(String methodCode)
    Analyzes the given methodCode, incrementing the counter if the line is valid
    void
    extractMetrics()
    Prepares the names of the files that will be evaluated and calls filterCode() for each of the files
    void
    filterCode​(File file)
    Analyzes the given file and calls applyMetricFilter for every line that is worth analyzing (ex: does not analyze commented lines)

    • LOC_class

      public LOC_class()
      Constructs and initializes a LOC_class

    • LOC_class

      public LOC_class​(MetricHandler metricHandler, String unitTest)
      Constructs and initializes a LOC_class, given an object MetricHandler and a String. This constructor is used only for Unit Testing
      Parameters:
      metricHandler - the metricHandler that will manipulate all the metrics
      unitTest - the string used for unit testing

    • LOC_class

      public LOC_class​(MetricHandler metricHandler)
      Constructs and initializes a LOC_class, given an object MetricHandler.
      Parameters:
      metricHandler - the metricHandler that will manipulate all the metrics

  • Method Details

    • extractMetrics

      public void extractMetrics()
      Prepares the names of the files that will be evaluated and calls filterCode() for each of the files

    • applyMetricFilter

      public void applyMetricFilter​(String methodCode)
      Analyzes the given methodCode, incrementing the counter if the line is valid
      Parameters:
      methodCode - string representing the line of the class that will be analyzed

    • filterCode

      public void filterCode​(File file)
      Analyzes the given file and calls applyMetricFilter for every line that is worth analyzing (ex: does not analyze commented lines)
      Parameters:
      file - file/class that will be analyzed
